images.summary: This elevation view shows the fall arrest track system, specifically the NIKO 26.000 Track supported by C6x8.2 back-to-back beams. The track is supported by vertical supports made of 30-inch long, 3-inch by 3/4-inch thick flat bars. The system is fastened with 5/8-inch diameter A325 bolts with 3/8-inch thick spacers, typical for the assembly. The total length of the track is 19 feet 8 1/4 inches, with sections spaced at 5 feet 10 inches apart. The elevation includes section callouts 1/S2 and 2/S2, indicating further details on another sheet. The drawing scale is 1/2 inch equals 1 foot.

1 1/2" = 1'-0"
5/8"Ø A325 BOLT
C6x8.2 BACK-TO-BACK (COPED)
INSTALL HSS1.5x1.5x1/4 x 24" LONG ON BOTH SIDES
3" x 3/8" THK WASHER (TYP.)
OWSJ BOTTOM CHORD
images.summary: This section view details the back-to-back connection at the cope for the fall arrest system. It features C6x8.2 back-to-back beams coped to fit around the existing structure. The connection is reinforced with HSS1.5x1.5x1/4 sections, 24 inches long, installed on both sides. Fastening is achieved using 5/8-inch diameter A325 bolts with 3-inch by 3/8-inch thick washers, typical for the assembly. The section highlights the connection to the OWSJ bottom chord. The drawing scale is 1 1/2 inches equals 1 foot, and it references section 3/S2 for further details.

images.summary: This fabrication detail illustrates the plate to flat bar connection for the fall arrest system. It includes a 3/4-inch thick flat bar and a 4 5/16-inch by 3/8-inch thick plate, complete with a 1/16-inch bolt hole for a 5/8-inch diameter A325 bolt. The flat bar is notched to accommodate the plate. The detail provides both front and side views, with dimensions of 5 1/2 inches and 2 1/2 inches for the flat bar, and a 4 5/16-inch length for the plate. The drawing scale is 1 1/2 inches equals 1 foot.

images.text_verbatim:
FABRICATION DETAIL
1/S2
FALL ARREST SYSTEM (4 REQD)
1" = 1'-0"
EXIST. PIPE
EXIST. OWSJ (TYP.)
COPE AS DIMENSIONED TO AVOID EXIST. PIPE (MIN. 1/2" RADIUS ON COPE)
EXTEND HSS PAST COPE MIN. 6"
LIMIT COPE TO 12" MAX. ON THE EXIST. PIPE SIDE
5/8"Ø A325 BOLT c/w (1) 3"Ø x 3/8" THK WASHER, EACH SIDE (TYP.)
INSTALL HSS1.5x1.5x1/4 x 24" LONG ON BOTH SIDES (SEE SECTION 3/S2)
(2) C6x8.2 BACK-TO-BACK
(2) 4 9/16" x 5 5/16" x 3/8" THK PLATES c/w 1/16" BOLT HOLES FOR (1) 5/8"Ø A325 BOLT
L2x2x1/4" SWAY BRACE c/w (1) 9/16"Ø BOLT HOLE FOR (1) 1/2"Ø A325 BOLT
30" LONG 3" x 3/4" THK FLAT BAR SUPPORT c/w (1) 9/16"Ø BOLT HOLE FOR SWAY BRACE BOLT & 1 1/16"Ø BOLT HOLE FOR 5/8"Ø SUPPORT BRACKET BOLT (MACHINE FLAT BAR TO 3/8" THK TO SUIT SUPPORT BRACKET)
3/8" THK PLATE NOTCHED INTO FLAT BAR SUPPORT
NIKO 26.803 SUPPORT BRACKET
NIKO 26.000 TRACK c/w TRACK END STOP w/ SAFETY BOLT & TRACK PUNCHING, EACH END
images.summary: This fabrication detail shows the fall arrest system, requiring four assemblies. It includes C6x8.2 back-to-back beams, L2x2x1/4 sway braces, and NIKO 26.803 support brackets. The system uses 5/8-inch diameter A325 bolts with 3-inch diameter by 3/8-inch thick washers on each side. The HSS1.5x1.5x1/4 sections, 24 inches long, are installed on both sides, as referenced in section 3/S2. The detail specifies coping dimensions to avoid existing pipes, with a minimum 1/2-inch radius and a maximum 12-inch limit on the existing pipe side. The drawing scale is 1 inch equals 1 foot.

images.summary: This section view details the C6 back-to-back connection for the fall arrest system. It features C6x8.2 back-to-back beams connected with 5/8-inch diameter A325 bolts and 3-inch by 3/8-inch thick washers, typical for the assembly. The connection is made to the OWSJ bottom chord. The drawing scale is 1 1/2 inches equals 1 foot, and it references section 2/S2 for further details.
